wikipedia_page.main: Sir William Murray Jardine, 13th Baronet of Applegirth, Dumfriesshire was born on 4 July 1984.  He is the son of Sir Alexander Maule Jardine of Applegirth, 12th Bt and Mary Beatrice Cross. Sir William succeeded to the title in 2008.Sir William Murray Jardine is the 24th Chief of Clan Jardine.  He is also President of the Jardine Clan Society.
